sequence:
Red Spider Lily's Love

<size=45>Chapter 1 - The Secretary in Red</size>

scripts.say: I brought the documents you'll need for your next meeting, Commander. Yes, I left them there as usual. Please go over them when you have the time.
That said, I've already examined them very thoroughly, of course. You don't even need to inspect any silly paperwork, I can deal with anything you wish...
... Ah, it must be because you're worried about overworking me~! You make me feel so happy, Commander~
Commander, I'm here to report on the exercises we had a while back.
Akagi gently clenched her fist. Suddenly, the mood in the office was getting tense...

options.content: Watch Akagi to see what she'll do

scripts.say: Commander... Hmph. Enterprise, seeing as we're on the same side now. If you're here to report to the Commander then would you please get on with it?
Yeah, no need to tell me...
It felt like the whole office was shaking, almost like an earthquake...
That's all I've got. I don't want to overstay my welcome, so I'll be taking my leave now.
Phew... Commander, you need not worry. Despite my reputation, I know how to keep my private and work lives separate. I would never do anything that might disrupt your work.
Right! Akagi will deal with that pest later and make you mine... but here in the office... Akaâ€”I will stay calm, okay?
